---
category: news
title: "Bethpage Federal Credit Union teams with Scienaptic AI on loan tech"
excerpt: "Bethpage Federal Credit Union in Bethpage, New York, is working with the financial technology firm Scienaptic AI to bolster its loan decisioning capabilities. The $11.5 billion-asset credit union first began partnership talks with the New York fintech last year to develop and test machine learning credit risk models within its consumer lending portfolio."
